Package com.foreach.across.core.filters

Interface BeanFilter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractClassBasedBeanFilter, AnnotatedMethodFilter, AnnotationBeanFilter, BeanFilterComposite, ClassBeanFilter, NamedBeanFilter, PackageBeanFilter
public interface BeanFilter
Helper used to filter the beans that should be exposed to the parent context.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • apply

      boolean apply(org.springframework.beans.factory.config.ConfigurableListableBeanFactory beanFactory, String beanName, Object bean, org.springframework.beans.factory.config.BeanDefinition definition)
      Checks if a bean or its corresponding BeanDefinition match the filter.
      Parameters:
      beanFactory - BeanFactory that owns the bean and definition.
      beanName - Name of the bean in the beanFactory.
      bean - Bean instance to check (can be null).
      definition - BeanDefinition corresponding to this bean (can be null). @return True if the bean and bean definition match.

    • empty

      static BeanFilter empty()
      Returns:
      a filter that does not match on any bean

    • annotations

      static BeanFilter annotations(Class<?>... classes)
      Creates an AnnotationBeanFilter for the given classes. This method is lenient and both null objects and non-Annotation instances can be passed. Only non-null classes extending Annotation will be taken into account.
      Parameters:
      classes - annotation classes
      Returns:
      filter matching on the annotations

    • instances

      static BeanFilter instances(Class<?>... classes)
      Creates a ClassBeanFilter for the given classes. This method is lenient: any null parameter value and classes extending Annotation will be ignored.
      Parameters:
      classes - the beans should match
      Returns:
      filter matching those classes

    • beanNames

      static BeanFilter beanNames(String... beanNames)
      Creates a NamedBeanFilter for the given bean names. This method is lenient: null bean names will be ignored.
      Parameters:
      beanNames - that should apply
      Returns:
      filter matching those bean names

    • packages

      static BeanFilter packages(String... packageNames)
      Creates a PackageBeanFilter for the given package names. This method is lenient: null package names will be ignored.
      Parameters:
      packageNames - from which beans should apply
      Returns:
      filter matching the packages

    • packages

      static BeanFilter packages(Class<?>... packageClasses)
      Creates a PackageBeanFilter for the given package names. Typesafe equivalent of packages(String...). This method is also lenient: null parameters will be ignored.
      Parameters:
      packageClasses - from whose packages the beans should apply
      Returns:
      filter matching the packages

    • composite

      static BeanFilter composite(BeanFilter... beanFilters)
      Creates a BeanFilterComposite for a given array of filters. This method is lenient, any null instances will simply be ignored.
      Parameters:
      beanFilters - to combine
      Returns:
      composite filter - never null

    • classNames

      static BeanFilter classNames(String... classNames)
      Creates a BeanFilterComposite for the given class names: if a class is present on the classpath and is not an annotation, it will be checked for instance. If it is an annotation it will check if the annotation is present either on the class or on the factory method that created it.
      Parameters:
      classNames - to add
      Returns:
      composite filter - never null
